spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Viconia's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Viconia is a 16th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). Viconia has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Viconia wears a {@item belt of fire giant strength} and a {@item cloak of protection} and wields a {@item +3 Mace||mace +3}. Without the belt, her strength is 12 and her speed is reduced to 20 ft.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Viconia has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put Viconia to sleep.

trait.name: Living Shadow
entries: While in dim light or darkness, Viconia has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Viconia has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Viconia attacks with her Mace +3 and casts a spell.

action.name: Mace, +3
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.
